Package uk.ac.leedsbeckett.oop

Class RailCell

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.leedsbeckett.oop.Cell
uk.ac.leedsbeckett.oop.TrackCell
uk.ac.leedsbeckett.oop.RailCell
Direct Known Subclasses:
TrackCrossing, TrackSwitch
@Deprecated public class RailCell extends TrackCell
Deprecated.
Use TrackCell and its subclasses instead
Legacy rail cell class kept for backward compatibility. New code should use TrackCell hierarchy (StraightTrack, CrossingTrack) instead.

      Deprecated.

      Parameters:
      position - the grid position
      connections - the set of orientations this rail connects to
      graphic - the image to display
      Throws:

  • Method Details

    • getConnections

      public Set<Orientation> getConnections()
      Deprecated.
      Description copied from class: TrackCell
      Gets the set of orientations that this track cell connects to. The connections determine which directions a vehicle can move to/from this cell.
      Specified by:
      getConnections in class TrackCell
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable set of orientations representing valid connections

    • hasConnection

      public boolean hasConnection(Orientation o)
      Deprecated.
      Description copied from class: TrackCell
      Checks whether this track cell has a connection in the specified orientation.
      Specified by:
      hasConnection in class TrackCell
      Parameters:
      o - the orientation to check
      Returns:
      true if this track has a connection in the given direction, false otherwise
